ygData.subject: Re: Why..
ygData.msgSnippet: well....everyone has their own opinion on such matters... my own reason is, if you dont think you can spend the time you earn the experience and items
ygData.messageBody:
well....everyone has their own opinion on such matters...

my own reason is, if you dont think you can spend the time you earn the
experience and items yourself, what fun is it? I take great pleasure in
earning things the hard way, thats the way I feel. But if someone doesnt
want take the time, thats up to him/her...really, if you got a lvl 50 char
with every rare item there is, what can you do? everything is done, except
exploring the world, and from what I have explored so far, town to town to
dungeon to wild life, it isnt that big just yet...I say yet, because Verant
can always add new zones and continents. and once that is done, what is
there to do? run around and brag? who knows...the fun in the game, IMHO, is
taking the time to play the game out, from the very beginning. To unveil
plots and quests piece by piece.

but, this is only my opinion, everyone will differ...




----------
From: Michael Wooldirdge <mike@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Why..
Date: Sunday, June 13, 1999 7:48 AM

Why do you feel it's wrong to sell acounts? A lot of people don't want to
waste the time getting a character up to a level where you can actually do
something. Also Verant is changing there license so it will be technically
legal to do.
